Class TagListReport

java.lang.Object
org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
org.apache.maven.reporting.AbstractMavenReport
org.codehaus.mojo.taglist.TagListReport
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo, org.apache.maven.reporting.MavenMultiPageReport, org.apache.maven.reporting.MavenReport
@Mojo(name="taglist", requiresDependencyResolution=COMPILE) public class TagListReport extends org.apache.maven.reporting.AbstractMavenReport
Scans the source files for tags and generates a report on their occurrences.
Author:
Fabrice Bellingard
